item.title: 英国特斯拉销量居欧洲首位之际，马斯克挑起斯塔默之争
item.description: 在英国成为特斯拉公司汽车在欧洲最大市场的同时，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在加紧抨击英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）及其新工党政府。【原文：Elon Musk is ramping up his attacks on British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and his new Labour government at the same time as the UK emerges as the largest market in Europe for Tesla Inc. vehicles.】

item.title: 炙手可热的债务市场销售狂潮吸引了渴望收益的买家
item.description: 借款人正以前所未有的速度涌入全球债务市场，因为他们想利用渴求信贷的经理们的需求，这些经理们现金充裕，已将公司债券利差推至近 30 年的低点。【原文：Borrowers are flooding global debt markets at an unprecedented pace as they seek to take advantage of demand from credit-hungry managers that are so flush with cash they have already driven corporate bond spreads to a near 30-year low.】

item.title: 摩根大通在银行业三巨头转投 SMBC 后重组 CLO 集团
item.description: 不到三个月前，三位资深银行家被三井住友金融集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is reshuffling the leadership ranks within its collateralized loan obligation business after losing a trio of veteran bankers to Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.’s rival platform less than three months ago.】

item.title: 前 Annapurna 视频游戏公司员工将收购前 Take-Two 独立厂牌
item.description:
随着新公司接管其投资组合，Private Division 的部分剩余员工将被解雇

。【原文：

Some of Private Division’s remaining employees will be laid off as the new company takes over its portfolio

】

item.title: 联想将于今年春季销售售价 3,499 美元带 "可滚动 "显示屏的笔记本电脑
item.description: 联想集团有限公司将于今年 3 月发布全球首款配备可扩展滚动显示屏的笔记本电脑，定价为 3499 美元。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. will release the world’s first laptop with an expanding rollable display this March, pricing it at $3,499.】

item.title: Addepar 以 32.5 亿美元的投前估值寻求融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华尔街财富管理和投资软件提供商Addepar公司正在洽谈融资2.5亿美元事宜。【原文：Wall Street wealth management and investment software provider Addepar Inc. is in talks to raise $250 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管政府停摆，加拿大仍将实行资本利得税改革
item.description: 尽管加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）暂停了议会会议，但加拿大税务部门仍将继续适用较高的资本收益包含率。【原文：Canada’s tax authority will continue applying the higher capital gains inclusion rate despite Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s suspension of Parliament.】

item.title: 美国撤出在社交媒体上打击暴力极端主义的行动
item.description: 据现任和前任美国官员以及互联网激进化专家称，联邦调查局和国土安全部在过去两年中已经缩减了破坏暴力极端分子网络活动的力度，他们担心在即将上任的特朗普政府领导下，这一趋势会加速发展。【原文：The FBI and Department of Homeland Security have scaled back efforts over the past two years to disrupt violent extremists’ online activities, according to current and former US officials and internet radicalization specialists who fear the trend will accelerate under the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 从天然气到培根，美国 IPO 交易总额达 180 亿美元
item.description: 华尔街为 2025 年的首次公开募股（IPO）市场拉开了序幕，大量文件为今年一些最大的潜在交易铺平了道路。【原文：Wall Street kicked off the 2025 IPO market with a flurry of paperwork paving the way for some of the year’s biggest potential deals.】

item.title: 国债这次表现不同的一个原因
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国商业服务业职位空缺升至六个月新高
item.description: 受商业服务业跃升的推动，美国 11 月份的职位空缺增至六个月来的最高点，而其他行业对工人的需求则较为参差不齐。【原文：US job openings rose to a six-month high in November, boosted by a jump in business services while other industries showed more mixed demand for workers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油发货量跌至 16 个月来最低点
item.description:
四周平均流量为 2023 年 8 月以来最小

。【原文：

Four-week average flows are the smallest since August 2023

】

item.title: 美国服务业指数攀升，物价指数创 2023 年以来新高
item.description: 美国服务提供商的增长速度在 12 月份有所加快，反映出更强劲的商业活动助推价格指数达到 2023 年初以来的最高点。【原文：Growth at US service providers quickened in December, reflecting stronger business activity that helped push a price measure to the highest since early 2023.】

item.title: 维修结束，俄罗斯燃料出口创五个月新高
item.description: 由于炼油厂季节性检修的结束促进了柴油和石脑油等主要燃料的流动，俄罗斯 12 月份的石油产品出口量升至五个月来的新高。【原文：Russia’s oil-product exports rose to a five-month high in December as the end of seasonal refinery maintenance boosted flows of key fuels like diesel and naphtha.】

item.title: 以色列小组建议每年新增战争开支 36 亿美元
item.description: 据一个专家小组称，以色列可能需要每年额外支出 130 亿谢克尔（36 亿美元）用于军事，以做好多线对抗的准备，这可能会进一步增加预算压力。【原文：Israel may need to spend an extra 13 billion shekels ($3.6 billion) per year on the military to prepare for confrontations on multiple fronts, according to a panel of experts, potentially putting further strain on the budget.】

item.title: 推动成为比特币最高监管机构的美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）主席将辞职
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席罗斯廷-贝赫南（Rostin Behnam）计划于 1 月 20 日辞职。【原文：US Commodity Futures Trading Commission Chairman Rostin Behnam plans to resign from the role on Jan. 20.】

item.title: 随着收益率上升，美国将支付自 2007 年以来最高的 10 年期债务
item.description: 债券市场的大跌将长期国债收益率推升至数月来的最高水平，而周二的 10 年期国债拍卖将以 17 年来最丰厚的收益率回报买家。【原文：The bond market selloff that’s lifted long-maturity Treasury yields to the highest levels in months stands to reward buyers at Tuesday’s auction of 10-year notes with the juiciest yield in 17 years.】

item.title: 干旱引发赞比亚新风险，克瓦查汇率跌至历史最低点
item.description: 赞比亚货币克瓦查跌至历史最低点，因为严重干旱导致电力价格上涨，并有可能损害这个非洲国家的经济。【原文：Zambia’s currency kwacha plunged to a record low as a severe drought increases power prices and risks hurting the African nation’s economy.】

item.title: 高盛集团为 CompuGroup 收购准备 11 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）在内的一组贷款人正在准备 11 亿欧元（12 亿美元）的杠杆融资，以支持 CVC Capital Partners Plc 收购 CompuGroup Medical SE & Co.KGaA 的收购。【原文：A group of lenders including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are preparing €1.1 billion ($1.2 billion) of leveraged financing to back CVC Capital Partners Plc’s buyout of CompuGroup Medical SE & Co. KGaA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能能源需求推动气候技术投资
item.description:
2024年，能源行业将超越交通运输业，成为全球领先的行业。这与人工智能的蓬勃发展密不可分。【原文：

In 2024, energy surpassed transportation to become the leading sector. It comes as AI is booming.

】

item.title: AEP 聘用前 Sempra 首席财务官，引领公用事业需求激增
item.description: 美国电力公司（American Electric Power Co.）聘用了 Sempra 公司的前首席财务官 Trevor Mihalik 担任同样的职务，因为这家美国最大的公用事业公司之一正面临着电力需求的增长，并寻求改善与监管机构的关系。【原文：American Electric Power Co. tapped Trevor Mihalik, the former chief financial officer of Sempra, for the same role as one of the largest US utilities faces power demand growth and looks to improve relations with regulators.】

item.title: 阿波罗公司的斯洛克说，国债收益率上升有可能引发特鲁斯执政时期的危机
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）的托斯滕-斯洛克（Torsten Slok）认为，国债收益率上升如此之快，以至于债券市场有可能出现类似英国首相利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）辞职时的动荡。【原文：Treasury yields have been rising so fast that there’s a risk of bond market turmoil resembling the upheaval that led to the resignation of then British Prime Minister Liz Truss, according to Apollo Global Management’s Torsten Slok.】

item.title: Meta 裁员，称内容审核 "太过分
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 将终止其在美国社交媒体平台上的第三方事实核查，让用户通过社区笔记系统对帖子的准确性发表评论，该公司称这将促进自由表达。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will end third-party fact checking on its social media platforms in the US, letting users comment on posts’ accuracy with a community notes system it said will promote free expression.】

item.title: 碧桂园 12 月份月度销售额降幅扩大
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司的销售额在 12 月份继续下滑，尽管中国房地产市场在政府实施刺激计划后出现了企稳迹象。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slump continued in December even as the Chinese property market showed signs of stabilization after the government’s stimulus packages.】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字扩大，进口创2022年以来最大增幅
item.description: 美国 11 月份的贸易逆差有所扩大，反映了自 2022 年 3 月以来最大的进口跃升，原因是在码头工人可能举行罢工之前，以及预期特朗普政府可能征收关税，企业加快了发货速度。【原文：The US trade deficit widened in November, reflecting the biggest jump in imports since March 2022 as companies accelerated shipments ahead of a possible dockworkers’ strike and in anticipation of potential tariffs by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 特朗普回国前加拿大对美贸易顺差扩大
item.description: 加拿大与美国的贸易顺差扩大，与世界其他国家的贸易逆差也在扩大，这凸显了加拿大最大的贸易伙伴和南部邻国在其经济中发挥的重要作用。【原文：Canada’s trade surplus with the US widened as did its deficit with the rest of the world, underscoring the major role its biggest trading partner and southern neighbor plays in its economy.】

item.title: 破产的 Northvolt 寻求投资者批准继续生产电池
item.description: 破产的电动汽车供应商 Northvolt AB 正在请求股东批准继续生产电池芯，同时寻求摆脱破产保护所需的新资金。【原文：Northvolt AB is asking for shareholder approval to keep building battery cells while the bankrupt electric-vehicle supplier seeks the new funding needed to emerge from Chapter 11 protection.】

item.title: 油轮老板预计伊朗制裁压力将提高收益
item.description: 世界上最大的油轮公司之一的老板说，最近加强对伊朗和俄罗斯石油流动制裁的举措应该会提高原油运输船的收益。【原文：The boss of one of the world’s largest tanker companies said recent moves to tighten sanctions on Iranian and Russian oil flows should boost earnings for crude-carrying vessels.】

item.title: CoreLogic 称澳大利亚房地产下滑可能是 "短暂的
item.description: CoreLogic Inc.公司称，澳大利亚房地产市场的衰退可能是 "浅层的、短暂的"，但在住房可负担性改善之前，很难看到经济恢复增长。【原文：Australia’s housing market downturn is likely to be “shallow and short-lived,” though it’s hard to see growth returning until home affordability improves, according to CoreLogic Inc.】

item.title: 在米莱和卢拉之间，巴拉圭财政部长选择了紧缩之路
item.description: 拉丁美洲正在成为政府极端支出的战场，小国呼吁在后果蔓延到其他国家之前勒紧裤腰带。【原文：Latin America is becoming a battleground of government spending extremes, drawing calls from smaller nations to tighten the belt before the consequences spill across borders.】
